title: AirPlay
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has At Bat installed on an iOS device
AND on the same network as Apple TV

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user plays a video highlight from the Video & Gameday section in the app and taps on the Airplay button in the media player and then selects your Apple TV
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video highlight is played through AirPlay on a TV

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user plays a Gameday Audio feed on the device
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Gameday Audio feed is played through AirPlay on a TV

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user plays an MLB.TV feed on the device
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the MLB.TV feed will be played through AirPlay on a TV

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user AirPlays an MLB.TV, a video highlight and/or Gameday Audio
and background the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN AirPlay stream should continue playing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN disableAirPlay is set to true in the iPhone config
and the user plays a VOD or MLB.TV feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will not see the AirPlay button

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN disableAirPlay is set to false in the iPhone config
and the user plays a VOD or MLB.TV feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the AirPlay button

title: Airplay -> Highlight Playable
custom_preconds:
* App is installed on device
* Device is on the same network as Apple TV
custom_steps: Given a user plays a video highlight from the Video & Gameday section in the app and taps on the Airplay button in the media player and then selects your Apple TV
custom_expected: THEN the video highlight is played through AirPlay on a TV

title: Airplay -> Gameday Audio
custom_preconds:
* App is installed on device
* Device is on the same network as Apple TV
custom_steps: Given a user plays a Gameday Audio feed on the device
custom_expected: THEN the Gameday Audio feed is played through AirPlay on a TV

title: Airplay-> MLBTV Feed
custom_preconds:
* App is installed on device
* Device is on the same network as Apple TV
custom_steps: Given a user plays an MLB.TV feed on the device
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV feed will be played through AirPlay on a TV

title: Airplay -> MLBTV -> Highlight
custom_preconds:
* App is installed on device
* Device is on the same network as Apple TV
custom_steps:
Given a user AirPlays an MLB.TV, a video highlight and/or Gameday Audio
and background the app
custom_expected: THEN AirPlay stream should continue playing

title: Airplay -> Disable Airplay Config Set to True
custom_preconds:
* App is installed on device
* Device is on the same network as Apple TV
* In charles, set Disable Airplay Config to "true"
custom_steps: Given user plays a VOD or MLB.TV feed
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see the AirPlay button

title: Airplay -> Disable Airplay Config Set to False
custom_preconds:
* App is installed on device
* Device is on the same network as Apple TV
* In charles, set Disable Airplay Config to "False"
custom_steps: Given user plays a VOD or MLB.TV feed
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the AirPlay button
